author: gdamour
msg: o Msgs can now be broadcasted to multiple ServerNodes.
o Msgs can now be routed from one ServerNode to another without
the need of a physical connection between them. More accurately,
based on the Topology of the ServerNodes (actual physical connections),
Msgs can be routed by intermediate ServerNodes.
o Round of performance improvement. Mainly the "core" classes have
been migrated from Serializable to Externalization.

author: djencks
msg: Deploy appropriate login module when requested
